docs.title: About
docs.text: I am PhD student at Dhirubhai Ambani University and  KDM Lab fellow. My interests lie in natural language processing in scholarly articles. I am also interested in LLM evaluation and model investigation. I am currently working on Hypothesis Generation Evaluation.
